trends: There have been no other sightings in Halifax
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswell me and my son were on our deck looking at stars and he saw flashing multy collored lights and we loked at them and it was a ufo. of course weve seen them before so we still loked at it and then it shined a light down on the ground and we were facinated but scared so we kept looking at it and it came lower and closer so then we went inside and got our camera when we cam out the ufo was gone.we thought it was a plane.it was silver and red and white flashing lights
Summary: the ufo looked circle and was silver had blue white yellow and red light flashing
